description.value: You were born on Akiton to a clan or group that traveled far and wide, never settling in one place for long. The first time you left Akiton, you discovered the planet's lower gravity had given you specific skills and adaptations in the art of leaping and jumping that translated well to battle in space and other strange environs. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Quick Jump] skill feat, even if you aren't trained in Athletics, and don't treat ice or sand as uneven ground.
